languages.text: "Эмелина исходит из предпосылки, что для войны с врагами Человечества хороши любые методы. Это... не непогрешимый ход мысли, однако в нем есть {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}зерно истины{/d}".

"Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Эмелина исходит из предпосылки, что для войны с врагами Человечества хороши любые методы. Это... не непогрешимый ход мысли, однако в нем есть {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}зерно истины{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a grain of truth."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “艾米莉娜的假设是，只要是为了打击人类之敌，无论采取什么手段都可以接受。她的推论过程并非……无懈可击，但她的说法确实{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}有一定道理{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “艾米莉娜的假设是，只要是为了打击人类之敌，无论采取什么手段都可以接受。她的推论过程并非……无懈可击，但她的说法确实有一定道理。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Emelina está actuando bajo la creencia de que absolutamente cualquier método es válido en la guerra contra los enemigos de la Humanidad. Su razonamiento no es... infalible, pero es cierto que contiene {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}parte de verdad{/d}».
languages.original_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «Emelina está actuando bajo la creencia de que absolutamente cualquier método es válido en la guerra contra los enemigos de la Humanidad. Su razonamiento no es... infalible, pero es cierto que contiene parte de verdad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エメリナさんは、人類の敵との戦争ではあらゆる手段が許容されるという前提の下で活動しています。彼女の推論は…絶対確実というわけではありませんが、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}一片の真実{/d}を含んでいます」
languages.original_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナさんは、人類の敵との戦争ではあらゆる手段が許容されるという前提の下で活動しています。彼女の推論は…絶対確実というわけではありませんが、{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}一片の真実{/d}を含んでいます」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Emelina part du principe que n'importe quelle méthode est acceptable dans le cadre de la guerre contre les ennemis de l'humanité. Son raisonnement n'est pas... sans faille, mais il renferme une {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}part de vérité{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « Emelina part du principe que n'importe quelle méthode est acceptable dans le cadre de la guerre contre les ennemis de l'humanité. Son raisonnement n'est pas... sans faille, mais il renferme une part de vérité. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina operiert unter der Annahme, dass im Krieg gegen die Feinde der Menschheit alle Methoden akzeptabel sind. Ihre Argumentation ist nicht ... unfehlbar, enthält aber definitiv ein {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Körnchen Wahrheit{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Emelina operiert unter der Annahme, dass im Krieg gegen die Feinde der Menschheit alle Methoden akzeptabel sind. Ihre Argumentation ist nicht ... unfehlbar, enthält aber definitiv ein Körnchen Wahrheit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina, İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı verilen savaşta her türlü yöntemin makbul olduğuna dair bir varsayımla hareket ediyor. Mantığı... Mutlak doğru olmamakla birlikte {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}bir miktar gerçeklik{/d} barındırıyor."
languages.original_text: "Emelina is operating under the assumption that any and all methods are acceptable in the war against the enemies of Humanity. Her reasoning is not... infallible, however, it does contain a {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}grain of truth{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Emelina, İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı verilen savaşta her türlü yöntemin kabul edilebilir olduğuna dair bir varsayımla hareket ediyor. Mantığı... Mutlak gerçek değil ancak yine de {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}bir miktar gerçek{/d} barındırıyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
